subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: A new DVR
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0004_01C9C1F2.C3D851B0
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Oh LOL!! No...you are technically correct.

There are 2 instruments that us=
 ghost hunters have in our arsenal that can go by the name of "DVR"; Digita=
l Voice Recorder and Digital Video Recorder.

To save some confusion, some =
of us refer to a digital voice recorder as simply a voice recorder. I have =
gotten so used to this term that I automatically think digital video record=
er when I hear DVR.

I also have an Olympus digital voice recorder. I LOVE =
it. In fact, I have had many over the years. I have had other brands too, b=
ut Olympus recorders are the best, as far as the affordable versions go.

A=
pril

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: purplespacefriend 
  To: EVP-=
ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, April 20, 2009 7:40 PM
  Subject: [EVP=
-ITC] Re: A new DVR





  DVR, as in digital voice recorder. I'm not usded=
 to using this new techno stuff, so maybe the terminology is wrong. Anyway,=
 I got it at Sams, $60, and it does have an external mic jack. I made a lin=
e to mic level adapter so I can record directly from the boxes. This one ha=
s built in USB connector, so it connects directly the PC. It records in WMA=
 format, and that is easliy converted to mp3, or played my windows media pl=
ayer. 

  F-S

  --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "April Abercrombie" <april=
@...> wrote:
  >
  > You have to tell how much and were to get one. I need =
a new DVR for my night vision cameras. I need to be able to hook an externa=
l mic to it as well, as the cameras do not have audio capability. I was goi=
ng to buy the Radio Shack one as someone suggested to me. Which would be fi=
ne, but I would really like to have USB connection.
  > 
  > Does it have a=
n internal harddrive?
  > 
  > April
  > 
  > ----- Original Message ----- =

  > From: Frank Sumption 
  > To: grassharp@yahoogroups.com ; evp-itc@yaho=
ogroups.com 
  > Sent: Sunday, April 19, 2009 9:43 PM
  > Subject: [EVP-ITC=
] A new DVR [7 Attachments]
  > 
  > 
  > [Attachment(s) from Frank Sumptio=
n included below] 
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > I bought a Radio Shack digital recore=
d years, and never liked it much. I picked up an Olympus WS-21S this aftern=
oon on a whim. I made a line to mic adapter, and did a couple box recording=
s. I don't know, might be better than tape. I has the advantage of of built=
 in USB connector, and it records in WMA format. 
  > 
  > I tried a short =
recording last night using the tones in 51, I don't think they help. 
  > 
=
  > Frank-S
  >
